# lodash.last v3.0.0

The [modern build](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/wiki/Build-Differences) of [lodashâ€™s](https://lodash.com/) `_.last` exported as a [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)/[io.js](https://iojs.org/) module.

## Installation

Using npm:

```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.last
```

In Node.js/io.js:

```js
var last = require('lodash.last');
```

See the [documentation](https://lodash.com/docs#last) or [package source](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/blob/3.0.0-npm-packages/lodash.last) for more details.
